content:
Klarman family

1 Abraham KLARMAN                    1780 - 1851 #181 (Lebel) {census family 121}
 + Feigele PISEK                     1779 - 1817 #106 (Herschel)
  2o Esther KLARMAN                  Oct 1, 1801 Krakow - Feb 22, 1888 #50
    * Herszl THORN                   c1808 - Dec 31, 1877 #563
          married Apr 25, 1826 #25
        FAMILY LISTING

          married 1825 #3
